_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Hastebin
author: steve@bussing.xyz
description: Run private hastebin for multiple users

installation.script:
#/bin/ash

apk add --no-cache git make gcc g++ python

cd /mnt/server
rm -rf node_modules
rm -rf .cache
rm -rf .npm
wget https://github.com/seejohnrun/haste-server/archive/refs/heads/master.zip
unzip master.zip
rm -rf master.zip
mv ./haste-server-master/* ./
rm -rf haste-server-master
npm install --force

echo -e "Private hastebin install complete"
exit 0
